Text: Great torrent and long awaited torrent. Watch out though, because all the files are doubled: there's two of each track in every folder. Make sure you spend some time going through the folders and unchecking the double. Some freak mistake probably - hopefully beerpal isn't as sloppy and bad with tagging like the disaster knaverlisa. Still, thought I'd give you a head's up so you don't DL every song twice.
Yep, all true. Also notice that the first track from The Temple Bar is missing. A pity when the uploader doesn't check the folders first.
